articles.description: The Minisforum AI X1 Pro launched in early March 2025, and at launch, there was only one configuration of the mini PC, which came with the Ryzen AI 9 HX 370. Now, the company has introduced three additional options which are more affordable.
articles.content: Minisforum introduced the AI X1 Pro as a new Strix Point gaming mini PC in March 2025. It made a global debut with a starting price of $1,129 (curr. $939.99 on Amazon), and now, the company has intro… [+1428 chars]

articles.author: Tyler Fischer
articles.title: Xbox Giving Away AAA Game for Free for 72 Hours Only - ComicBook.com
articles.description: The Microsoft Store has a free AAA Xbox game available to all Xbox One, Xbox Series S, and Xbox Series X users for the next 72 hours.
articles.content: The Microsoft Store has a free AAA Xbox game for Xbox One, Xbox Series S, and Xbox Series X users, however, the offer is only available for the next 72 hours or, more precisely, until May 27. Once re… [+2591 chars]
